title: Process an Online Return by Mail
description: A customer service agent processes a returned package that a customer mailed back from an online order.

tasks.description: Scan the RMA (Return Merchandise Authorization) number on the packing slip inside the box.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system retrieves the details of the return request.

tasks.description: Inspect the returned item to ensure it is in good condition.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent confirms the item is eligible for a refund.

tasks.description: Mark the return as 'Received and Processed' in the system, which triggers an automatic refund to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: The return is processed, and the customer's refund is initiated.
